mutants.code:
def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = 1
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):
        window_sum += arr[i] - arr[i - K]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]

def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = -1
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):
        window_sum += arr[i] - arr[i - K]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]

def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = 0
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):

        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]

def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = 0
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):
        window_sum += arr[i] * arr[i - K]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]

def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = 0
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):
        window_sum += arr[i] - arr[i + K]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]

mutants.code:
def find_max_subset(arr, K):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = 0
    window_sum = sum(arr[:K])
    max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    for i in range(K, len(arr)):
        window_sum += arr[i] - arr[i * K]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
    return arr[:K]
